data.description: Knicks fans were at least given something to cheer for during their brutal Friday loss to the Thunder. Seven-time Olympic gold medalist Simone Biles was seen courtside at Madison Square Garden alongside her husband, Bears safety Jonathan Owens.

data.title: Rare gold coin donated to red kettle for The Salvation Army
data.description: A 26-year tradition in Fort Collins continued when a South African Krugerrand gold coin worth thousands showed up in The Salvation Army's red kettle.
data.content:
DENVER (KDVR) — A rare South African Krugerrand gold coin worth thousands was found amid the spare change donated to a Salvation Army red kettle in Colorado.
